## Public Member Functions

### shouldOmitSectionDirective() {#a60042114571b446593a3521980593d4d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SPIRVMCAsmInfo::shouldOmitSectionDirective (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> SectionName) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Return true if the .section directive should be omitted when emitting <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sectionname">SectionName</a></code>.

For example:

shouldOmitSectionDirective(&quot;.text&quot;)

returns false =&gt; .section .text,#alloc,#execinstr returns true =&gt; .text

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/lib/target/spirv/mctargetdesc/spirvmcasminfo-h/#l00025">25</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/lib/target/spirv/mctargetdesc/spirvmcasminfo-h">SPIRVMCAsmInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/lib/target/spirv/mctargetdesc/spirvmcasminfo-cpp/#l00032">32</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/lib/target/spirv/mctargetdesc/spirvmcasminfo-cpp">SPIRVMCAsmInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
